terms.intro: These Terms of Service govern your use of the FiBuKI application, operated by Infinity Vertigo GmbH.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By registering for or using FiBuKI, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the application.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content:
FiBuKI is software designed to assist with bookkeeping pre-accounting. The application provides:

• Management of bank transactions
• Automatic receipt matching
• AI-powered categorization
• Integration with bank accounts and email

The application does not replace professional tax or accounting advice.

useAtOwnRisk.content:
Use of FiBuKI is at your own risk. You are responsible for the accuracy of your inputs and the proper maintenance of your accounting records.

We strongly recommend reviewing all automatically generated categorizations and matches before using them for tax purposes.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect

services.title: Third-Party Services
services.intro: We use the following third-party services to provide our services:

firebase.name: Firebase (Google)
firebase.purpose: Authentication, database, file storage, and cloud functions. Your data is stored in the EU (europe-west1).

gmailApi.name: Gmail API (Google)
gmailApi.purpose: Email access for receipt search. Only active when you connect your Gmail account via OAuth. You can revoke access at any time.

cloudVision.name: Google Cloud Vision API
cloudVision.purpose: Text recognition (OCR) in uploaded documents for automatic data extraction.

vertexAi.name: Vertex AI / Gemini (Google)
vertexAi.purpose: AI-powered document analysis, categorization, and intelligent matching of receipts.

anthropic.name: Anthropic Claude API
anthropic.purpose: AI chat assistant for accounting questions and intelligent support.

truelayer.name: TrueLayer
truelayer.purpose: Open Banking access (UK/EU) for securely fetching your account transactions.

gocardless.name: GoCardless Bank Account Data
gocardless.purpose: Open Banking access (Europe) for securely fetching your account transactions.

langfuse.name: LangFuse
langfuse.purpose: Analysis and optimization of AI interactions for quality improvement.
